data.message: this FB account https://www.facebook.com/Raya.fm boasts videos shared by a terror organization where you can see how they injure a soldier, he is alive crying for help, they torture him a bit, hit him on his head and then shoot him. then try to steal his body. but still Facebook leaves this pages online similar to other racist hatefull pages promoting violence. you have a responsibility as human beings not to allow brutal violence promotion against a gender or  a race.
